name: Rokurokubi (AlexandreIsidorio)
description:
A game made at UQAT in 2019.

In this game, Two players take control of the head and the body of a japanese demon trying to get revenge on their ex-partners in the yakuza. Both players can either fight directly the enemy or if they can avoid detection, they stealthily assassinate the enemies. By doing a stealth kill, the character can then use the dead body to use their special ability. The Head eats the body and replenishes health while the body can take the health to be able to pass in front another guard.

Controller Obligatory to play the game
2 player only
